base_url.description: The base url where announcements are published

date_format.description: Date format used in announcements filenames

lambda_artifacts_dir.description: Directory containing pre-built lambda zip artifacts (check_announcement.zip, send_notification.zip, send_telegram_notification.zip)

prefix.description: Optional prefix to namespace resource names

schedule_expression.description: Scheduling expression to check a new announcement

telegram_auth_token.description: Telegram Auth Token to publish new announcements

telegram_lambda_reserved_concurrency.description: Reserved concurrency for send_telegram_notification to avoid Telegram rate limits
